derate sabandatha shakthimath karamin niwasa, saukhya ha jiwanopaya wani sanwardhana wadasatahan wenuwen indiyawe aadhara labadena bawa penwa dun indiya widesha katayuthu amathiwaraya ee wenuwen idiriyatath aadhara kirimata sudanam bawa prakasha kaleya.mehidi shri lanka rajaya ha demala jathika sandhanaya athara pawathina sakachcha sambandhayen adahas pala karamin kiya sitiye ema sakachcha itha sarthaka wanu athi bawath ee thulin shri lankawe anagathayata honda wisandumak labenu athi bawathya.me athara janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha hamuwi sarthaka sakachchawaka nirathawu bawa sandahan kala krishna mahatha 13 wani aandukrama wyawastha sanshodhanaya wada idiriyata giya sanshodhanayak wenuwen adahas pala kala bawada kiweya.eeta amatharawa indu lanka dhiwarayan muhuna dena gatalu sambandhayen mathakadi sakachchawak pawathi bawath ee mangin dhiwara gataluwa sarthakawa wisanda ganimata hakiwanu athayi thama balaporoththuwana bawath hethema sandahan kaleya.widesha katayuthu amathi mahacharya ji.el.piris, niyojya amathi niyomal perera, widesha amathyanshaye lekam karunathilaka amunugama, mahabhandagara lekam aacharya pi.bi. jayasundara, indiyawe shri lanka maha komasaris prasad kariyawasam ha shri lankawe indiya maha komasaris ashok ke kanth mahathwaru athulu pirisak me awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha..

akusal kala pudgalayan apagathawa duk windina aakarayath kusal kalawun diwyalokaye sapa sampath windina aakarayath me katha sangrahayanhi dak wenawa.shasanika wyapthiya sandahath wishala adithalamak mihindu himiyan wethin itu wenawa neda?mihindu himiyan bhikshu shasanaya pihituwimata mulikawa kriya kirimen ha dhathu aagamanaya sidu kirimen, shri maha bodhiya meratata wadama kirima mangin shasanaye idiri wyapthiya sandaha wishala mularambhayak athi karanawa.emenma maha wiharaya mul karagena adhyapana aayathana bihi kirimatath bhashawa ha sahithyaye poshanayatath wihara aarama idikirima sandahath mihindu himiyan wethin dewana pathis raja wetha margopadeshakathwayak labenawa.mahindagamanaye prathipalayak washayen ape ratata labunu mulopayika adahas atharin rajya palanaya pilibanda danuma suwishesha wanne manda?palakayeku rajya thanthraya meheyawimedi siya anasaka kendraye sita prathyantha rajadhani kara meheya wiya yuthu aakaraya pilibanda wa th rajyaye sanwardhanaya sandaha janatha sahaya labagatha yuthu aakaraya pilibandawa th pasu kalina palakayanta wadagath wana pradhana mulopayan rasak merata thula sthapitha wuye mahindagamanaye prathipalayak washayenuyi.raju rataka palakaya nowa bharakaruwa ya” yana adahasa wishesha yi.

ithin me siddiya wune 2002 awurudde wesak kale.hamoma wage pusoth wesak, poson kalawalata kudu hadana eka samanya deyak.ithin wesak kittu weddi purupuru, game hitapu mansge yaluwo wechcha rohitha saha amanaya ekka ekathu wela una bata kapanna yanna thiranaya kalalu.game thibuna sarusarama una padura thibune wela madde.una padure ayithikaraya hitiye welen eha paththe thibuna game.oyita kalinuth eka parak me una paduren batayak kapaganna ape yaluwanta puluwan wuna.
munupura me widihe wadan pelak thamage muhunupothe (fes buk pituwe) satahan kara thibune mita dina kipayata peradiyi.
